summary: Completed testing of Night Pilot LKW Routenplaner app. Backend APIs mostly functional (8/9 tests passed), but frontend has critical CSS compilation errors preventing UI from loading.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 'No route found' error for valid coordinates
flaky_endpoints.possible_cause: OpenRouteService API key issue or external service unavailable

ui_bugs.issue: Tailwind CSS compilation errors preventing app from loading
ui_bugs.details: CSS classes not properly defined in Tailwind config causing build failures
Dark class needs to be applied to document element, not div

integration_issues.issue: Frontend not loading due to CSS compilation errors
integration_issues.details: Build process fails, preventing any UI testing

passed_tests: AI break advice API (LLM integration working)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend CSS compilation errors. The Tailwind CSS configuration has issues with custom classes (dark, bg-warning) that prevent the app from building. Frontend is completely non-functional due to build failures. Backend APIs are mostly working well with only route planning having external API issues.
